players_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(100),matches INT,innings VARCHAR(50),runs INT,average FLOAT)
indian_players_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS indian_players (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, playing_role VARCHAR(50), batting_style VARCHAR(50), bowling_style VARCHAR(50))
recent_matches_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS recent_matches (match_id VARCHAR(50), series_id VARCHAR(50), series_name VARCHAR(255), match_type VARCHAR(50), match_desc VARCHAR(100), match_format VARCHAR(10), start_date VARCHAR(50), end_date VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(50), status VARCHAR(255), state_title VARCHAR(100), is_time_announced VARCHAR(10), is_tournament VARCHAR(10), team1_id VARCHAR(50), team1_name VARCHAR(100), team1_sname VARCHAR(10), team1_image_id VARCHAR(50), team2_id VARCHAR(50), team2_name VARCHAR(100), team2_sname VARCHAR(10), team2_image_id VARCHAR(50), venue_id VARCHAR(50), venue_ground VARCHAR(255), venue_city VARCHAR(100), venue_timezone VARCHAR(10), venue_latitude VARCHAR(20), venue_longitude VARCHAR(20), curr_bat_team_id VARCHAR(50), series_start_dt VARCHAR(50), series_end_dt VARCHAR(50), team1_innings_id VARCHAR(50), team1_runs VARCHAR(50), team1_wickets VARCHAR(50), team1_overs VARCHAR(50), team2_innings_id VARCHAR(50), team2_runs VARCHAR(50), team2_wickets VARCHAR(50), team2_overs VARCHAR(50))
odi_info_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odi_info (matchtype_id VARCHAR(10), matchtype_desc VARCHAR(20), team_id VARCHAR(10), team_shortname VARCHAR(10), selected_matchtype VARCHAR(10), batter_rank VARCHAR(10), batter_name VARCHAR(50), matches VARCHAR(10), innings VARCHAR(10), runs VARCHAR(10), average VARCHAR(10))
international_series_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS international_series (date VARCHAR(20), series_id VARCHAR(20), series_name VARCHAR(255), start_dt VARCHAR(20), end_dt VARCHAR(20))
international_venues_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS international_cricket_venues (series_id VARCHAR(20), series_name VARCHAR(255), venue_id VARCHAR(20), ground VARCHAR(255), city VARCHAR(100), country VARCHAR(100))
venues_info_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS venues_info (ground VARCHAR(255), city VARCHAR(100), country VARCHAR(100), timezone VARCHAR(10), capacity VARCHAR(100), established VARCHAR(10), knownAs VARCHAR(255), homeTeam VARCHAR(255), ends VARCHAR(255), curator VARCHAR(100), profile TEXT, groundLength VARCHAR(20), groundWidth VARCHAR(20))
international_teams: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS international_cricket_teams (teamId VARCHAR(20), teamName VARCHAR(100), teamSName VARCHAR(10), countryName VARCHAR(100))
